system.description:
Zero-G: working and living under microgravity conditions. Also covers the use of space suits and heavy armor. When characters are in combat in microgravity, they should use the lower of their combat or Zero-G skill.

Examples: throw Zero-G/DEX 6+ to traverse harsh terrain in microgravity conditions on an asteroid. Throw Zero-G/DEX 8+ to fire a weapon at boarders in microgravity. Throw Zero-G/STR 8+ to grapple someone in microgravity.
system.shortdescr: Working and living under microgravity conditions
